neighbors.name: Kelley-Hill Properties LLC
neighbors.claims: Kelley-Hill Properties LLC is a limited liability company identified as a donor to the McLeod Health Foundation in South Carolina ([McLeod Health](https://www.mcleodhealth.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/McLeod_Foundation_2016_AR.pdf)). Public records associate the entity with individuals Amber Kelly and Tammy R. Kelly ([McLeod Health](https://www.mcleodhealth.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/McLeod_Foundation_2016_AR.pdf)). The entity has been identified as the holder of the "Cypress Road Tract," a 64.59-acre timberland parcel in Lee County (PIN 024-00-00-167-000) ([AFM Real Estate](https://www.afmrealestate.com/properties/64.59-acres-land-for-sale-in-lee-county-south-carolina/cypress-road-tract)). Real estate listings indicate this specific tract was sold on December 1, 2025, suggesting a recent transaction of the asset ([LandWatch](https://www.landwatch.com/south-carolina-land-for-sale/lee-county/available/under-contract/sold)). The entity appears to function as a land investment vehicle or holding company.
neighbors.influence_justification: Entity is a donor to local health foundations but shows no evidence of political office or public advocacy.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the associated individuals (Amber/Tammy Kelly) acknowledging their support of local health initiatives. Given the recent sale of the Cypress Road Tract, verify current landholdings before making a formal offer.

neighbors.name: McLeod Woodham Property LLC
neighbors.claims: The existence of a specific entity named 'McLeod Woodham Property LLC' could not be verified in South Carolina public records. The surname 'Woodham' is historically significant in Lee County, associated with the Thomas Fraser House (also known as the Woodham House) ([Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_Fraser_House)). The name 'McLeod' is also prominent in the region, appearing in local graduations and church records ([The Miscellany](https://archives.themiscellany.org/2020/07/02/the-class-of-2020-graduates-in-style/)). The tax parcel identifier provided in the draft (025-00-00-057-000) resolves to a property in Portage County, Ohio in open datasets ([Redfin](https://www.redfin.com/OH/Streetsboro/1126-Gaynelle-Ave-44241/home/75392715)), indicating a probable data match error in the original draft.
neighbors.influence_justification: Entity existence cannot be confirmed; influence level is indeterminate.

approach_recommendations.engage: Do not engage until entity existence and property ownership are verified against internal county tax rolls. The current data appears to be a mismatch or hallucination.

neighbors.verification_notes: Could not verify entity. Search for 'McLeod Woodham Property LLC' returned no exact matches in SC. The provided PIN returns a valid address in Ohio, suggesting a clerical error in the draft. While 'McLeod' and 'Woodham' are valid local families, this specific LLC appears unverified.
